committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Fisheries and Wildlife Conservation and the Environment

official_title: To provide for the conveyance of the Frankfort National Fish Hatchery to the Commonwealth of Kentucky, and for other purposes.

summary.text: (Measure passed Senate, amended) Directs the Secretary of the Interior to convey: (1) the Frankfort National Fish Hatchery in Franklin County, Kentucky, to the State of Kentucky; (2) the Berlin National Fish Hatchery in Berlin, New Hampshire, to the State of New Hampshire; and (3) the Lake Mills National Fish Hatchery in the Town of Lake Mills, Wisconsin, to the State of Wisconsin.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the conveyance of the Frankfort National Fish Hatchery to the Commonwealth of Kentucky.
To provide for the conveyance of the Frankfort National Fish Hatchery to the Commonwealth of Kentucky, and for other purposes.
